projects.name: statuspulse.io
projects.description: Co-founder of statuspulse.io, a status monitoring website (4000+ services). Built with React and Flask and deployed on AWS (ECS Fargate + Lambda).

projects.name: LearnFP
projects.description: A website to teach functional programming concepts through courses and exercises. Made with JavaScript, Gatsby.js, and Firebase.

projects.name: Photo Chess
projects.description: Mobile app that uses a trained Tensorflow Lite model and OpenCV to recognize physical chess pieces and positions and converts to a playable board.

projects.name: Fantasy Basketball Predictor
projects.description: Trained machine learning models such as Random Forest and Ridge Regression to predict NBA player fantasy points.

projects.name: Chess AI
projects.description: Chess AI using Minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning, multi-threading, MVV-LVA, and quiescence search.

projects.name: WanderSync Travel App
projects.description: Travel planning app with accounts, trip management, dining, accommodation, and more. Made with Java, Android Studio, and Firebase.

projects.name: Snake Game
projects.description: Classic Snake game implemented in JavaScript with HTML5 Canvas.
